Disclaimer

The following short script is very rough.

 1 from selenium import webdriver
 2 import os
 3 import urllib
 4 
 5 chromedriver = "/path/to/your/selenium/chromedriver"
 6 os.environ["webdriver.chrome.driver"] = chromedriver
 7 driver = webdriver.Chrome(chromedriver)
 8 
 9 driver.get('https://www.google.co.jp/search?q=selenium&safe=off&source=lnms&tbm=isch&sa=X')
10 
11 imgs = driver.find_elements_by_css_selector('img.rg_i')
12 n = 1
13 for i in imgs:
14   src = i.get_attribute('src')
15   if src is None:
16     continue
17   urllib.urlretrieve(src, "capture_%d.jpg" % n)
18   n+=1
19 
20 #driver.close()
